roleset.name: emit light, sparkle
roleset.note: SHIMMER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls light_emission-43.1. (from shimmer.01-v)

example.name: true romance
example.text: ``Your eyes shimmer like a swamp on a cloudy night,'' whispered John to Mary.
example.arg: like a swamp on a cloudy night

roleset.name: verb of motion?
roleset.note: SHIMMER-V NOTES: I think the writer invented this usage. Maybe s/he meant 'shimmy'? oh well why not? sounds nice. (from shimmer.02-v)

example.name: weird example
example.text: If mutation and natural selection slowly but surely give rise to more and more advanced forms of life, then it was only a matter of eons before splendid beings endowed with reason, self-awareness and taste shimmered onto the scene.
example.arg: splendid beings endowed with reason, self-awareness and taste
